<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div       window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script><style type="text/css">.regua-navegacao,.regua-navegacao-tab,.has-regua .barra-globocom{display:none}.regua-svg-container{height:0;width:0;position:absolute;left:-999999px}</style><div e.prototype.insertJsOnScriptTag=function(e,n,t){var o;return t&&(n+="\n//# sourceMappingURL="+t),o=document.createTextNode(n),e.appendChild(o)},e.prototype.injectScriptTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),r.src=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectScript=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=a(t),this.insertJsOnScriptTag(r,n,o),f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectLinkTag=function(e,n,t,o){var r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return n.success(e)},e.prototype.getRequestManager=function(e,n){return!n||"js"!==e&&"css"!==e?"jsonp"===e?ajaxCache.getJsonp:ajaxCache.get:this.skipCacheRequestManager},e.prototype.require=function(e,n){var t,o,r,i,s,a,c,l,u,p,g,f,w;if(o=this,e)for(m(e)||(e=[e]),i=0,a=e.length;a>i;i++)l=e[i],w=l.url,f=l.type,u=l.skipCache||n,null==f&&(f=w.split("."),f=f[f.length-1]),r=this.getHandler(f,u),c=this.getRequestManager(f,u),g=l.success||function(){},p=l.sourceMap||"",s=l.id||l.key||"ajax-cache-id-"+Math.round(1e5*Math.random()),"string"==typeof g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new r,"undefined"!=typeof n&&n.exports&&(n.exports=window.tinyBasket)},{}]},{},[3]);</script><script>(function(){var n;window.glb=window.glb||{},glb.cdnComponents=glb.cdnComponents||[],glb.cdnComponents.push("menu"),glb.menuReady=!0,n=null!==window.noAutoLoadFN&&window.noAutoLoadFN,n||(glb.fnTimeoutMs=glb.fnTimeoutMs||2e3,null!==glb.fnTimeout&&clearTimeout(glb.fnTimeout),glb.menuReady&&glb.headerReady&&glb.reguaReady?glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig):glb.fnTimeout=setTimeout(function(){return glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>


<!--END content for url: http://sportv.globo.com/servico/sportv/nba/header.html-->



<!-- END SSI fork for esi or beo -->

<!-- End licensee_global_navigation -->
       <!--SSI /frags/licensee_content_top_banner.html -->
       <!-- Start Licensee Content Top Banner Fragment -->


<!-- SSI fork for esi or beo -->

          <div class="row container-row">
          
            <div class="col-xl-2 visible-xl text-right content-aside content-aside-left" data-ng-hide="mobileAppViewMode">

              <div class='content-container-top' data-ng-show="showNav">

              </div>
  
              <div class='content'>
                <!-- Start content -->
                  <div class='league-schedule-section'  data-ng-controller="SchedulePageCtrl">
  <sib-page-header data-sib-title="_page.schedule"></sib-page-header>
  <div class="row">
    <div class="col-12" style="float: none;">
      <div class="sib-custom sib-custom-schedule-header" data-ng-controller="ScheduleHeaderCtrl" data-ng-cloak>
  <div class="row header-wrap">
    <div class="col-lg-6 col-sm-6 col-12 content-left">
      <div class="quicklinks" >
        <i class="icon-caret-left" data-ng-class="scheduleType" data-ng-click="changeMonth('prev')" ></i>
          <span data-ng-show="scheduleType == 'day'">{{activeDate | date:'mediumDate'}}</span>  
          <span data-ng-show="scheduleType == 'days'">{{startDate | date:'mediumDate'}} - {{endDate | date:'mediumDate'}}</span>
          <span data-ng-show="scheduleType == 'month'">{{activeDate | date:'monthYear'}}</span> 
        <i class="icon-caret-right" data-ng-class="scheduleType"  data-ng-click="changeMonth('next')"></i>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-lg-6 col-sm-6 col-12 content-right">
      <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="calendar-button" data-ng-class="{toggled: contentDrop=='calendar'}" data-ng-click="clickcalendar()"><span data-ng-i18next="schedule.calendar"></span><i class="icon-calendar" data-ng-hide="contentDrop=='calendar'"></i><i class="icon-remove" data-ng-show="contentDrop=='calendar'"></i></a>
      <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="select-team-button" data-ng-class="{toggled: contentDrop=='teams'}" data-ng-click="clickteam()"><span data-ng-i18next="schedule.selectTeam"></span><i class="icon-list-alt" data-ng-hide="contentDrop=='teams'"></i><i class="icon-remove" data-ng-show="contentDrop=='teams'"></i></a>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="row">
    <div class="col-12">
      <div class="calendar-drop" data-ng-show="contentDrop=='calendar'">
        <div data-ng-controller="CalendarCtrl" data-ng-cloak>
  <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="prev-month" data-ng-click="clickLeft()"><i class="icon-caret-left"></i></a>
  <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="next-month" data-ng-click="clickRight()"><i class="icon-caret-right"></i></a>
  <sib-calendar month-index="offsets[0]" cal-position="'left'" active-date="activeDate"></sib-calendar>
  <sib-calendar month-index="offsets[1]" cal-position="'center'" active-date="activeDate"></sib-calendar>
  <sib-calendar month-index="offsets[2]" cal-position="'right'" active-date="activeDate"></sib-calendar>
</div>      </div>
      <div class="team-drop" data-ng-show="contentDrop=='teams'">
        <div class="row" data-ng-controller="TeamListCtrl">
  <div class="col-12 conferenceholder" data-ng-repeat="(conferenceKey, conference) in conferences">
    <div class="row conference">
      <div class="col-12 conference-title">
        <h4>{{'allTeams.' + conferenceKey.toLowerCase()|i18next}} {{'allTeams.conferenceTitle'|i18next}}</h4>
      </div>
      <div class="row" data-ng-repeat="(key, division) in conference.divisions">
        <div class="team" data-ng-repeat="team in division">
            <a data-ng-href="/teams/schedule/#!/{{ team.code }}">
              <sib-img-team team-abbr="team.abbr | earlyTeamChange:'imgAbbr'"></sib-img-team> <!--  this is only when the schedule is released, need to make the earlyTeamChange smarter -->
            </a>
            <a class="hidden-sm" data-ng-href="/teams/schedule/#!/{{ team.code }}">
              <!-- this is only when the schedule is released, need to make the earlyTeamChange smarter -->
              <span data-ng-bind-html="team.displayAbbr | earlyTeamChange:'abbr'"></span>              
            </a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>    </div>
    <div class="col-12">       
      <!-- Team Schedule Module Start -->
<div class="sib-table-container sib-table-league-schedule" data-ng-cloak>
  <div data-ng-show="moduleLoading" class="preloader">
    <img src="/media/img/loader.gif" /><br/>
  </div>
  <div id="sib-team-schedule" data-ng-show ="!moduleLoading" bindonce data-ng-repeat="group in splits">
    <table class="sib-zebra-stripes" id="sib-league-schedule">
      <thead class="not-sortable">
        <tr class="headers">
          <th class="not-sortable col-time" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1"  data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.time"></th>
          <th class="col-matchup" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.matchup"></th>
          <th class="col-score" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.score"></th>
          <th class="col-location" data-ng-show="!paginate" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.location"></th>
          <th class="col-broadcaster" data-ng-show="group.status == 'Incomplete' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.broadcast"></th>
          <th class="col-location" data-ng-show="paginate && currentpage==2" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.location"></th>
          <th class="col-links" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1" data-ng-i18next="schedulePage.links"></th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody data-ng-repeat="date in group.dates">
        <tr class="caption">
          <td colspan="100%">
            <h6>{{ date.games[0].profile.utcMillis | date:'monthDay' }}</h6>
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr  data-ng-repeat="game in date.games">
          <td class="col-time" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">
            <span bo-show="game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'CNCL' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'PPD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'TBD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == '\u5ef6\u671f' ">{{ game.boxscore.statusDesc  }}</span>
            <span bo-hide="game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'CNCL' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'PPD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == 'TBD' || game.boxscore.statusDesc == '\u5ef6\u671f' ">{{ game.profile.utcMillis | date:'shortTime' }}</span>             
          </td>
          <td class="col-matchup" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1"><a sib-team-urls team="game.awayTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.awayTeam.profile.code" bo-text="game.awayTeam.profile.displayAbbr"></a> @ <a sib-team-urls team="game.homeTeam.profile" bo-href="'/teams/#!/' + game.homeTeam.profile.code " bo-text="game.homeTeam.profile.displayAbbr"></a></td>
          <td data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">
            <span bo-show="game.boxscore.status > 1"><span bo-class="{'red': game.boxscore.awayScore > game.boxscore.homeScore }" bo-text=" game.boxscore.awayScore"></span> - <span bo-class="{'red': game.boxscore.awayScore < game.boxscore.homeScore }" bo-text=" game.boxscore.homeScore"></span></span>
            <span bo-show="game.boxscore.status == 1">-</span>
          </td>
          <td data-ng-show="!paginate" bo-text="game.profile.arenaName"></td>
          <td  data-ng-show="group.status == 'Incomplete' && (!paginate || currentpage==2)">
            <sib-broadcaster-urls broadcasters="game.broadcasters" />
            <span class="broadcaster">
			  <span class="live"><span data-ng-repeat="url in game.urls | filter: { type : 'Live' }" bo-text="url.displayText"></span></span>
			</span> 
          </td>
          <td data-ng-show="paginate && currentpage==2" bo-text="game.profile.arenaName"></td>
          <td class="links" data-ng-show="!paginate || currentpage==1">
            <sib-game-urls game="game"></sib-game-urls>
          </td>
        </tr>
      </tbody>
    </table>
    <div class="table-footer">
      <div class="pagination" data-ng-show="paginate==true">
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=1" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==1}"></a>
          <a href="javascript:void(0)" data-ng-click="currentpage=2" data-ng-class="{active: currentpage==2}"></a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  </div>

                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/blogs/especial-blog/ponta-de-lanca/1.html" >Ponta de Lança</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/blogs/especial-blog/ultimmato/1.html" >UltiMMAto</a></li>
                            


                        

    

        
                </ul>
            </div>

            <div class="glb-grid-2 large-2 column">
                
                <ul class="divisoria">
                
        

                    <li class="diretorio-indice">
                        
                            <strong>Institucional</strong>
                        
                    </li>


                        


                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://www.grupoglobo.globo.com/" >Grupo Globo</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/videos/campanhas" >Campanhas</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://globosatcomercial.globo.com/" >Como Anunciar</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/como-assistir.html" >Como Assistir</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/institucional.html" >Mundo do SporTV</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/noticia/2011/05/politica-de-privacidade.html" >Política de Privacidade</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/noticia/2011/05/sobre-o-sportv.html" >Sobre o SporTV</a></li>
                            
                                
                                <li><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/programas/rio-2016/noticia/2016/02/globosat-realiza-processo-seletivo-para-os-jogos-olimpicos-do-rio.html" >Trabalhe Conosco</a></li>
                            


                        

    
                </ul>
            </div>

         </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="row">
        <div class="column columns container" data-ga-marker="links">

    <script type="text/javascript">
      (function() {
        var po = document.createElement('script'); po.type = 'text/javascript'; po.async = true;
        po.src = 'https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js?onload=onLoadCallback';
        var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(po, s);
      })();
    </script>
    <script src="https://apis.google.com/js/client:plusone.js"></script>

    <script>
    var socialCounts = "";

    if(location.href.indexOf("vogue.globo.com") > 0) {
        $.ajax({
          url: "/vogue/mais_compartilhadas/revista/16/",
          dataType: 'json',
          async: false,
          success: function(data) {
            socialCounts = data.list;
          },
          error : function() {
                  try {
                      console.log("Erro ao carregar json de mais compartilhadas");
                  } catch (e) {
                    //silenciada
                  }
            }
        });
    }

    var fill_social_count = function(url) {
        var social_count_obj = "";
        $.each(socialCounts, function(key, obj) {
            if(obj.url == url) {
                social_count_obj = obj;
                return false;
            }
        })
        return social_count_obj;
    }

    <!-- Place this tag after the last +1 button tag. -->
    window.___gcfg = {lang: 'pt-BR'};

    (function() {
    var po = document.createElement('script'); po.type = 'text/javascript'; po.async = true;
    po.src = 'https://apis.google.com/js/platform.js';
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(po, s);
    })();
    </script>

		<div class="container">
			<div class="box-assine-ja">
				<a href="#">Assine Já</a>
			</div>

    <script>
        $("#fixed-nav .box-assine-ja a").html($(".box-assine-ja-desktop a.assine-ja").html());
        $("#fixed-nav .box-assine-ja a").attr('href', $(".box-assine-ja-desktop a.assine-ja").attr("href"));

    <div id="glb-corpo">
        
    <div class="glb-conteudo">
        
    


<script src="http://s.videos.globo.com/p2/j/api.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>

	<!-- 

  	***************************************************************************
  	Destaques
  	***************************************************************************

  -->

    
        
	


    
	

	<div class="slider destaques destaque-principal">
		<div class="wrap-slider">
			
			

				
					

    <div class="destaque item-slider">
        <div class="item-a">
            <figure class="img" data-title="Dhela no Brasil" style="background-image:url('http://s2.glbimg.com/ydjtoPvWEt7T8N_T9XFjIPe_G58=/smart/e.glbimg.com/og/ed/f/original/2017/03/27/slider-fenix-fashion-2.jpg');"></figure>
        </div>

        

        <div class="container">
            <strong class="chamada">Dhela no Brasil</strong>
            <h2 class="titulo">
                <a href="http://vogue.globo.com/moda/noticia/2017/03/conheca-colecao-de-estreia-da-dhela-grife-de-daniella-helayel-estilista-queridinha-de-kate-middleton.html" title="Dhela no Brasil">A coleção de estreia de Daniella Helayel</a>
            </h2>
        </div>
    </div>


				
				
					

    <div class="destaque item-slider">
        <div class="item-a">
            <figure class="img" data-title="MÚSICA" style="background-image:url('http://s2.glbimg.com/_i9lZlhFlTATZy-6M5kQgX6CCTs=/smart/e.glbimg.com/og/ed/f/original/2017/03/24/slider-lollapalooza.jpg');"></figure>
        </div>

        

        <div class="container">
            <strong class="chamada">MÚSICA</strong>
            <h2 class="titulo">
                <a href="http://vogue.globo.com/lifestyle/cultura/noticia/2017/03/lollapalooza-brasil-2017-os-destaques-femininos-do-line-.html" title="MÚSICA">Lollapalooza 2017: as mulheres do line-up</a>
            </h2>
        </div>
    </div>


				
				
					

    <div class="destaque item-slider">
        <div class="item-a">

    <h2 class="titulo">
        <a title="Direto de Cuiabá" href="http://vogue.globo.com/mundo-vogue/promovogue/5/noticia/2017/03/martha-medeiros-apresenta-sua-nova-colecao-de-inverno.html">Direto de Cuiabá</a>
    </h2>
    <p class="descricao hidden-xs hidden-sm">
        <a title="Direto de Cuiabá" href="http://vogue.globo.com/mundo-vogue/promovogue/5/noticia/2017/03/martha-medeiros-apresenta-sua-nova-colecao-de-inverno.html">Martha Medeiros apresenta sua nova coleção de inverno</a>
    </p>

		</div>

    var urlFim = "?servico=plantao_vogue2&exclude_section_paths=/vogue/beleza/gente,/vogue/moda/gente&filtro=materias";
</script>


    <script type="text/javascript">

        $(function () {
            Vogue.materias.init(url);
            $('.destaques').sliderVogue({auto:true});
        });
    </script>

    <script type="x-tmpl-mustache" id="destaque-2">

                <div class="box-social">
                    <a class="btn-social facebook" onclick=open_social_popup(600,300,"facebook","http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u={{permalink}}");>
                        <i class="ico"></i>
                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getFacebookCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>
                    <a class="btn-social twitter" onclick=open_social_popup(700,300,"twitter","https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url={{permalink}}");>
                        <i class="ico"></i>
                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getTwitterCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>
                    <a class="btn-social plus" onclick=open_social_popup(490,300,"googleplus","http://plus.google.com/share?hl=en-US&url={{permalink}}");>
                        <i class="ico"></i>
                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getGplusCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>
                    <a class="btn-social pinterest" onclick=open_social_popup(600,300,"pinterest","http://www.pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url={{permalink}}");>
                        <i class="ico"></i>
                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getPinterestCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>
                </div>
            </aside>
            <div class="conteudo">
                <figure class="box-img">
                    <a href="{{permalink}}" title="{{titulo}}"><img src="{{extra_thumb.560x475}}" class="img-responsive" alt="{{titulo}}"></a>
                </figure>
                <span class="promovogue">promovogue</span>
                <h2 class="titulo"><a href="{{permalink}}" title="{{titulo}}">{{titulo}}</a></h2>

                <div class="banner">
                    <div style="width:300px;margin:auto;">
                        <iframe src="/dinamico/get_oas_advertisement/?position={{ad_position}}&sitepage={{sitepage}}" width="300px" height="600px" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </article>
    </script>

    <script type="x-tmpl-mustache" id="destaque-3">
        <article id="materia-{{pk_i}}" class="materia destaque-3">
            <aside class="side-materia">
                <div class="box-data">
                    <span class="data dia">{{#ultima_atualizacao}}{{getDay}}{{/ultima_atualizacao}}</span>
                    <span class="data mes">{{#ultima_atualizacao}}{{getMonth}}{{/ultima_atualizacao}}</span>
                    <span class="data ano">{{#ultima_atualizacao}}{{getYear}}{{/ultima_atualizacao}}</span>
                </div>
                <div class="box-social">
                    <a class="btn-social facebook" onclick=open_social_popup(600,300,"facebook","http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u={{permalink}}");>
                        <i class="ico"></i>
                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getFacebookCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>
                    <a class="btn-social twitter" onclick=open_social_popup(700,300,"twitter","https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url={{permalink}}");>
                        <i class="ico"></i>
                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getTwitterCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>
                    <a class="btn-social plus" onclick=open_social_popup(490,300,"googleplus","http://plus.google.com/share?hl=en-US&url={{permalink}}");>
                        <i class="ico"></i>
                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getGplusCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>
                    <a class="btn-social pinterest" onclick=open_social_popup(600,300,"pinterest","http://www.pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url={{permalink}}");>
                        <i class="ico"></i>
                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getPinterestCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>
                </div>
            </aside>
            <div class="conteudo">
                <figure class="box-img">
                    <a href="{{permalink}}" title="{{titulo}}"><img src="{{extra_thumb.580x470}}" class="img-responsive" alt="{{titulo}}"></a>
                </figure>

                <div class="descricao">
                    <h3 class="chamada hidden-xs hidden-sm">{{#editoria_principal}}{{getCustomEditoriaPrincipal}}{{/editoria_principal}}</h3>
                    <h2 class="titulo"><a href="{{permalink}}" title="{{titulo}}">{{titulo}}</a></h2>
                    <a href="{{permalink}}" title="{{titulo}}" class="link-continue hidden-xs hidden-sm">Continue lendo &gt;</a>
                    <div class="banner">
                        <div style="width:300px;margin:auto;">
                            <iframe src="/dinamico/get_oas_advertisement/?position={{ad_position}}&sitepage={{sitepage}}" onload="resizeIframe(this);" width="300px" height="250px" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </article>
    </script>

    <script type="x-tmpl-mustache" id="destaque-4">
        <article id="materia-{{pk_i}}" class="materia destaque-4">
            <aside class="side-materia">
                <div class="box-data">
                    <span class="data dia">{{#ultima_atualizacao}}{{getDay}}{{/ultima_atualizacao}}</span>
                    <span class="data mes">{{#ultima_atualizacao}}{{getMonth}}{{/ultima_atualizacao}}</span>

                </div>

                    </a>

                </div>
            </div>
        </article>
    </script>

    <script type="x-tmpl-mustache" id="destaque-5">
        <article id="materia-{{pk_i}}" class="materia destaque-1">
            <aside class="side-materia">
                <div class="box-data">
                    <span class="data dia">{{#ultima_atualizacao}}{{getDay}}{{/ultima_atualizacao}}</span>
                    <span class="data mes">{{#ultima_atualizacao}}{{getMonth}}{{/ultima_atualizacao}}</span>

                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getFacebookCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>
                    <a class="btn-social twitter" onclick=open_social_popup(700,300,"twitter","https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url={{permalink}}");>
                        <i class="ico"></i>
                        <span class="total">{{#permalink}}{{getTwitterCount}}{{/permalink}}</span>
                    </a>

                    </a>

                </figure>

                <a title="{{titulo}}" href="{{permalink}}" class="link-continue hidden-xs hidden-sm">Continue lendo &gt;</a>
            </div>

            <hr class="divisoria-padrao hidden-xs">

            <div class="banner hidden-xs">
                <iframe src="/dinamico/get_oas_advertisement/?position={{ad_position}}&sitepage={{sitepage}}" onload="resizeIframe(this);" height="90px" width="620px" frameborder="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>
            </div>
        </article>
    </script>



<script>
    var resizeIframe = function(obj) {
        var src = $(obj).attr('src');
        var permalink = document.location.pathname;
        if($(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight > 250) {
            $(obj).parents(".materia").addClass("destaque-2");
            $(obj).parents(".materia").removeClass("destaque-3");
            $(obj).attr("style", "height:" + $(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + "px")
              if ((permalink.match(/Videos/i)) || (permalink.match(/Video/i)) ){
                $('.box-img a').prepend('<span class="btn-play-video" style="margin-top: 10px; width: 87px;height: 85px;text-indent: -9999px;background: url(http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/vogue2/img/ico-play-pequeno.png) no-repeat;background-size: cover;position: absolute;z-index: 16; left: 80px;">Play</span>');
              }
        } else if(src.indexOf('position=Top') >= 0){
            $(obj).attr("style", "margin: 0 auto;display:block;height:" + $(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight + "px;width:" + $(obj)[0].contentWindow.document.body.scrollWidth + "px");
              if ((permalink.match(/Videos/i)) || (permalink.match(/Video/i))){
                $('.box-img a').prepend('<span class="btn-play-video" style="margin-top: 10px; width: 87px;height: 85px;text-indent: -9999px;background: url(http://e.glbimg.com/og/ed/edg3/static_files/vogue2/img/ico-play-pequeno.png) no-repeat;background-size: cover;position: absolute;z-index: 16; left: 80px;">Play</span>');
              }
        }
    }
</script>


                
                    <div id="widget-publicidade" class="widget-publicidade super">
	<div id="super"></div>
</div>
                

			</section>
		</div>
	</div>







    


    </div>

    </div>

    
  <div id="dhtml"></div>

    <script>
  var dadosNavegg = {};

  if (typeof nvg13574 !== "undefined") {

    dadosNavegg.gender = nvg13574.getSegment("gender");
    dadosNavegg.age = nvg13574.getSegment("age");
    dadosNavegg.education = nvg13574.getSegment("education");
    dadosNavegg.marital = nvg13574.getSegment("marital");
    dadosNavegg.income = nvg13574.getSegment("income");
    dadosNavegg.interest = nvg13574.getSegment("interest");
    dadosNavegg.product = nvg13574.getSegment("product");
    dadosNavegg.brand = nvg13574.getSegment("brand");
    dadosNavegg.career = nvg13574.getSegment("career");
    dadosNavegg.country = nvg13574.getSegment("country");
    dadosNavegg.region = nvg13574.getSegment("region");
    dadosNavegg.city = nvg13574.getSegment("city");
    dadosNavegg.cluster = nvg13574.getSegment("cluster");

  }

  function getCookie(name) {
      var value = "; " + document.cookie;
      var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
      if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
  }

  function getCADUNID() {

    var cadunId = getCookie('CADUN_ID');
    cadunId = cadunId.replace(/['"]+/g, '');
    
    return cadunId.substring(0, 10);

  }

  function getCookieGADS() {

    var gads = getCookie('__gads');
    return gads.split(':')[0].split('=')[1];

  }


  var globoId = getCADUNID();
  var iddfp = getCookieGADS();
  var idga = getCookie('_ga').match(/\d{2,}.{1}\d{2,}/)[0];

  console.log(globoId, iddfp, idga);

</script>

<script>

  (function(i,s,o,g,r,a,m){i['GoogleAnalyticsObject']=r;i[r]=i[r]||function(){
  (i[r].q=i[r].q||[]).push(arguments)},i[r].l=1*new Date();a=s.createElement(o),
  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');
  ga('create', 'UA-18915097-1', 'auto', {userId: globoId});
  ga('require', 'displayfeatures');
  ga('set', 'dimension3',globoId);
  ga('set', 'dimension4',iddfp);
  ga('set', 'dimension5',idga);
  ga('set', 'dimension6',dadosNavegg.gender);
  ga('set', 'dimension7',dadosNavegg.age);
  ga('set', 'dimension8',dadosNavegg.education);
  ga('set', 'dimension9',dadosNavegg.marital);
  ga('set', 'dimension10',dadosNavegg.income);
  ga('set', 'dimension11',dadosNavegg.interest);
  ga('set', 'dimension12',dadosNavegg.product);
  ga('set', 'dimension13',dadosNavegg.brand);
  ga('set', 'dimension14',dadosNavegg.career);
  ga('set', 'dimension15',dadosNavegg.country);
  ga('set', 'dimension16',dadosNavegg.region);
  ga('set', 'dimension17',dadosNavegg.city);
  ga('set', 'dimension18',dadosNavegg.cluster);
  ga('send', 'pageview');

</script>

  	<script type="
